provenance: Estate of the artist; (Curt Valentin [d. 1954] through Curt Valentin Gallery, New York, New York by 1955); Charles and Nucy Meech, Minneapolis, Minnesota from 1955 through 1980; gift to MIA in 1980.

title: Dance Training
